Aries.title: The Pioneer
Aries.text: You light matches just to see what burns. Missions start when you kick doors, not when you ask permission. People follow because you move before fear remembers its job.

Taurus.title: The Builder
Taurus.text: You haul dreams into brick and steel. Patience is your war drum, consistency your quiet rebellion. Nothing you claim leaves your hands unchanged.

Gemini.title: The Signal
Gemini.text: Your mind runs a dozen news feeds at once and still asks for more bandwidth. You weaponize curiosity like a scalpel. Boredom is the only thing you refuse to tolerate.

Cancer.title: The Hearth
Cancer.text: You carry a shell made of intuition and barbed wire. Loyalty is your currency, and you give receipts. Anyone stepping into your orbit feels both scrutinized and protected.

Leo.title: The Crown
Leo.text: Spotlights bend to you like sunflowers. You manifest warmth and drama in the same breath. Even your silence feels choreographed.

Virgo.title: The Editor
Virgo.text: You dissect chaos until it behaves. Precision is how you show love, upgrades how you apologize. The world is your draft folder.

Libra.title: The Arbiter
Libra.text: You read rooms the way others read headlines, instantly and with judgment. Harmony isn’t passive; it’s a strategy. Beauty is your favorite blunt instrument.

Scorpio.title: The Depth Charge
Scorpio.text: You sense motives before the sentence ends. Intensity is your resting state, transformation your hobby. People either confess or combust around you.

Sagittarius.title: The Voyager
Sagittarius.text: You treat truth like a wildfire—dangerous but cleansing. Deadlines and borders are suggestions. Optimism is your fuel, brutal honesty your exhaust.

Capricorn.title: The Climber
Capricorn.text: You see hierarchies like topographical maps and plan your ascent accordingly. Ambition is your love language. Discipline lets you bend time to your will.

Aquarius.title: The Disruptor
Aquarius.text: You jailbreak every system you touch. Detachment keeps emotions from fogging your blueprints. Revolution is just another Tuesday.

Pisces.title: The Oracular
Pisces.text: You translate feelings into myth. Boundaries blur because you’ve already merged with the collective signal. Reality takes your notes, not the other way around.

Aries.title: Ember Heart
Aries.text: Your emotions hit like flash grenades—bright, loud, gone. You crave reactions more than reassurance. Peace arrives only after action.

Taurus.title: Stone Sanctuary
Taurus.text: You soothe yourself with texture, ritual, and possession. Slow comfort beats dramatic breakthroughs. Anyone who disrupts your calm gets locked out.

Gemini.title: Whisper Network
Gemini.text: Feelings show up as data points and gossip. You process emotions by explaining them twice. Restlessness is your emotional weather pattern.

Cancer.title: Tidal Soul
Cancer.text: Your moods move like phases of the moon—predictable only if you’re paying attention. Home is your fortress and your soft spot. Loyalty is stitched into every heartbeat.

Leo.title: Golden Pulse
Leo.text: Validation is the thermostat for your feelings. You love loudly, sulk theatrically, and forgive with flair. Affection must come with spotlights.

Virgo.title: Quiet Analyst
Virgo.text: You autopsy your emotions before admitting they exist. Order calms your nerves; usefulness grounds your heart. Overthinking is just quality control.

Libra.title: Silk Equilibrium
Libra.text: You negotiate with your own feelings like a diplomat. Emotional stability requires aesthetic balance. Conflict makes your stomach knot, but you’ll still curate the aftermath.

Scorpio.title: Secret Volcano
Scorpio.text: Your emotions smolder beneath a locked hatch. Trust is earned through x-ray honesty. Betrayal turns your heart into scorched earth.

Sagittarius.title: Wildfire Spirit
Sagittarius.text: You feel best when there’s a horizon to chase. Emotional ruts trigger your escape velocity. Truth-telling is your form of intimacy.

Capricorn.title: Granite Core
Capricorn.text: Stoicism is your emotional armor. You grieve in spreadsheets and love through reliability. Vulnerability arrives only after a background check.

Aquarius.title: Electric Calm
Aquarius.text: You prefer logic to tears and distance to drama. Emotional clarity shows up as sudden downloads. Your heart speaks in hypotheses.

Pisces.title: Dream Reservoir
Pisces.text: You absorb everyone’s feelings like it’s a side gig. Escapism is your first aid kit. Compassion floods every crack, even the undeserving ones.

Aries.title: The Sprinter
Aries.text: Thoughts hit the page before spellcheck catches up. You argue like a spark plug, firing first and editing later. Your words are impact grenades, efficient and loud.

Taurus.title: The Mason
Taurus.text: You build arguments brick by brick until they can’t be toppled. Patience makes your logic sound inevitable. Silence is your favorite rhetorical pause.

Gemini.title: The Switchboard
Gemini.text: Every idea gets patched into three more channels. You remix facts mid-sentence and still land the point. Conversation is a sport you always play to win.

Cancer.title: The Archivist
Cancer.text: Memory and mood braid into every sentence. You speak in emotional weather reports, forecasting safety or storm. Soft words, sharp implications.

Leo.title: The Herald
Leo.text: You deliver messages like royal decrees. Dramatic emphasis is your punctuation. Confidence fills any gaps the facts can’t cover.

Virgo.title: The Calibrator
Virgo.text: You diagnose flaws in arguments faster than people finish them. Precision is your comfort zone; data is your love language. Overthinking is just quality assurance.

Libra.title: The Diplomat
Libra.text: Every sentence balances fairness with style. You negotiate opinions like treaties, ensuring both sides leave impressed. Charm is your thesis statement.

Scorpio.title: The Interrogator
Scorpio.text: You hear lies breathing under the dialogue. Questions cut straight to the marrow. Words are blades you wield with unnerving calm.

Sagittarius.title: The Broadcaster
Sagittarius.text: You serve truth unfiltered and at high volume. Philosophies arrive fully formed, even if you came up with them while running late. Hyperbole is just enthusiasm in your dialect.

Capricorn.title: The Strategist
Capricorn.text: You communicate like you’re drafting corporate bylaws. Every word has a job and a deadline. Sarcasm doubles as quality control.

Aquarius.title: The Frequency
Aquarius.text: Ideas download straight from the future. You talk in prototypes and proof-of-concept metaphors. Detachment keeps you objective, not cold.

Pisces.title: The Mystic Scribe
Pisces.text: You narrate reality like a lucid dream. Logic bends around intuition and still lands somewhere true. People listen because you make the surreal sound sensible.

Aries.title: Volcanic Crush
Aries.text: You fall fast, loud, and with a competitive streak. Love feels like a mission you must win. Boredom is the only deal-breaker.

Taurus.title: Devoted Collector
Taurus.text: You romance through permanence—textures, rituals, shared assets. Loyalty is non-negotiable; indulgence is a sacred right. You curate relationships like heirlooms.

Gemini.title: Flirt Circuit
Gemini.text: Your heart bond happens through wordplay and late-night tangents. You crave minds that multitask. Commitment must come with curiosity.

Cancer.title: Moonlit Anchor
Cancer.text: You seduce through caretaking and emotional clairvoyance. Softness is your power move. Anyone in your orbit gets fed, warned, and fiercely defended.

Leo.title: Royal Heat
Leo.text: Love requires spectacle, loyalty, and applause. You gift affection like gold coins and expect devotion in return. Drama is just proof of passion.

Virgo.title: Sacred Service
Virgo.text: You prove love by refining lives—tuning habits, fixing chaos, upgrading comfort. Perfectionism is how you protect what you treasure. Compliments must be practical.

Libra.title: Velvet Gravity
Libra.text: Aesthetic chemistry is step one, mutual admiration step two. You balance affection with precision. Harmony is the glue; elegance is the wrapping.

Scorpio.title: Obsidian Heart
Scorpio.text: Love is an oath signed in obsession and loyalty. You crave bonds that survive psychic x-rays. Half measures trigger your exit plan.

Sagittarius.title: Wild Arrow
Sagittarius.text: You court with blunt truth and shared adventures. Passion thrives on wide horizons. Anyone trying to cage you becomes history fast.

Capricorn.title: Iron Vow
Capricorn.text: Romance is a long-term investment, not a side quest. You show affection through reliability and strategic spoiling. Trust must be earned with receipts.

Aquarius.title: Cosmic Ally
Aquarius.text: You love like a futurist—unconventional, idealistic, and fiercely loyal to individuality. Intellect sparks attraction, freedom keeps it alive. Emotions get decoded through shared missions.

Pisces.title: Tidal Devotion
Pisces.text: You love in dissolving waves—romantic, empathic, unguarded. Soul connections are your baseline. Boundaries blur because you’d rather merge than negotiate.

Aries.title: The Warrior
Aries.text: You launch before the countdown finishes. Anger is fuel, not a flaw. Victory tastes best when everyone doubted your timing.

Taurus.title: The Juggernaut
Taurus.text: Once you commit, nothing short of tectonic plates will move you. Persistence is your artillery. You’d rather break obstacles than compromise.

Gemini.title: The Whirlwind
Gemini.text: You fight with words, wit, and tactical chaos. Multiplicity keeps you dangerous. Standing still feels like surrender.

Cancer.title: The Shieldbearer
Cancer.text: You defend your people like a tidal fortress. Emotion flips your fight switch faster than logic. Retaliation is personalized and unforgettable.

Leo.title: The Solar Blade
Leo.text: You act with theatrical conviction. Pride fuels your momentum; applause seals the win. Every move is a statement piece.

Virgo.title: The Surgeon
Virgo.text: You execute with surgical precision. Efficiency is your preferred weapon. Rage gets repurposed into flawless strategy.

Libra.title: The Duelist
Libra.text: You fight for equilibrium, even if you must break a few hearts on the way. Charm masks your tactical edge. Justice is your trigger.

Scorpio.title: The Infiltrator
Scorpio.text: You wage war in silence and finish it with scorched earth. Intensity keeps you relentless. Enemies never see the strike until it lands.

Sagittarius.title: The Archer
Sagittarius.text: You aim high, fire far, and refuse to retreat. Actions must align with belief or they fall apart. Restlessness keeps you in motion.

Capricorn.title: The Commander
Capricorn.text: You prefer long games with ironclad results. Discipline sharpens every move. Rivalries are fuel for your ascent.

Aquarius.title: The Rebel Engine
Aquarius.text: You act to rewrite the rules, not follow them. Detachment keeps your strategy cold and effective. Progress is your battlefield.

Pisces.title: The Undertow
Pisces.text: You fight from the shadows with intuition as your compass. Energy flows in waves; when you strike, it’s a flood. Compassion doesn’t mean mercy.

Aries.title: Brave Expansion
Aries.text: You chase luck by charging first. Risks feel like a divine dare. Opportunity shows up when you act louder than doubt.

Taurus.title: Steady Fortune
Taurus.text: You grow abundance through patience and tangible value. Gratitude multiplies your resources. Stability is your chosen luxury.

Gemini.title: Infinite Curator
Gemini.text: You collect perspectives like souvenirs. Curiosity opens doors others don’t notice. Conversations are your favorite passport.

Cancer.title: Sheltering Faith
Cancer.text: You expand by nurturing what matters. Emotional wisdom guides every gamble. Home becomes a sanctuary for everyone you bless.

Leo.title: Radiant Triumph
Leo.text: Confidence is your magnetic field. You attract luck when you act like it’s already yours. Generosity seals the deal.

Virgo.title: Measured Growth
Virgo.text: You chase mastery, not hype. Improvements stack into empires. Optimism shows up as spreadsheets and actionable faith.

Libra.title: Diplomatic Horizon
Libra.text: Partnerships unlock your fortune. You broker harmony and watch the returns compound. Grace is your growth strategy.

Scorpio.title: Depth Fortune
Scorpio.text: You transform crisis into opportunity. Intuition guides your high-stakes bets. Power finds you when you stop pretending you don’t want it.

Sagittarius.title: Cosmic Nomad
Sagittarius.text: You expand by outrunning limits. Philosophy is your compass, spontaneity your vehicle. Luck keeps pace with your optimism.

Capricorn.title: Legacy Architect
Capricorn.text: You invest in structures that outlive you. Responsibility magnetizes power. Success is the sermon you preach by example.

Aquarius.title: Future Syndicate
Aquarius.text: You share knowledge like a rebellion manual. Innovation multiplies your blessings. Community is your chosen wealth.

Pisces.title: Mystic Tide
Pisces.text: Faith swells your life in poetic surges. Compassion invites miracles. You surf synchronicity like it’s a skill you invented.

Aries.title: The Self-Made
Aries.text: You build discipline by repeatedly ramming the wall until it learns your name. Patience is learned, not gifted. Leadership comes with scar tissue.

Taurus.title: The Stabilizer
Taurus.text: You construct patience into wealth. Security is your sacred contract. Obstacles crumble under your consistency.

Gemini.title: The Analyst
Gemini.text: You systematize curiosity, turning questions into frameworks. Communication demands rigor. Every fact gets audited.

Cancer.title: The Guardian
Cancer.text: You protect what’s fragile with iron boundaries. Emotional maturity is earned through responsibility. Family becomes your lifelong project.

Leo.title: The Regal Engineer
Leo.text: You architect pride into sustainable influence. Recognition must be merited. Authority feels natural once you prove loyalty to your craft.

Virgo.title: The Precisionist
Virgo.text: You perfect every moving piece even when no one watches. Discipline thrives in the details. Service is your brand of mastery.

Libra.title: The Arbiter
Libra.text: You enforce fairness with courtroom logic. Relationships require contracts, not vibes. Harmony is maintained through accountability.

Scorpio.title: The Shadowsmith
Scorpio.text: You transmute crisis into control. Power is handled with surgical restraint. Depth isn’t optional; it’s the curriculum.

Sagittarius.title: The Doctrine
Sagittarius.text: You codify beliefs into structures others can climb. Freedom runs on principles, not chaos. Wisdom gets published through lived proof.

Capricorn.title: The Mountain
Capricorn.text: You embody discipline, ambition, and long-term consequence. Legacy is your north star. Authority sticks because you outlast everyone else.

Aquarius.title: The Innovator
Aquarius.text: You run revolutions with spreadsheets. Structure is how you protect humanity from itself. Progress must have scaffolding.

Pisces.title: The Mystic Anchor
Pisces.text: You bind spiritual insight to practical duty. Compassion wears steel-toed boots. Dreams get deadlines on your watch.

Aries.title: Flashpoint Rebel
Aries.text: You detonate change like a chain reaction. Impulse is revelation. Systems adjust or crumble when you enter the room.

Taurus.title: Seismic Gardener
Taurus.text: You terraform stability using shockwaves. Innovation grows slowly but permanently. Tradition survives only after renovation.

Gemini.title: Quantum Messenger
Gemini.text: You transmit ideas at lightning speed, splicing concepts mid-flight. Conversation becomes a lab experiment. Curiosity is your firmware.

Cancer.title: Emotional Uprising
Cancer.text: You revolt through nurturing. Domestic life becomes a test lab for radical care. Intuition delivers disruptive downloads.

Leo.title: Royal Hacker
Leo.text: You rewrite the script by owning the stage. Creativity is your rebellion. Authenticity hits like a solar flare.

Virgo.title: Precision Renegade
Virgo.text: You debug reality one flaw at a time. Revolution happens through improved efficiency. Chaos submits to your spreadsheets.

Libra.title: Equity Maverick
Libra.text: You upend social constructs with elegance. Justice gets redesigned in real time. Charm masks the radical nature of your ideas.

Scorpio.title: Psychic Disruptor
Scorpio.text: You hack the underworld and leak its source code. Transformation is non-negotiable. Secrets have expiration dates around you.

Sagittarius.title: Myth Breaker
Sagittarius.text: You shatter dogma with neon flamethrowers of truth. Philosophies reboot when you touch them. Wanderlust doubles as a coup.

Capricorn.title: System Architect
Capricorn.text: You innovate from within, flipping hierarchies using their own rules. Tradition only survives if it evolves. Authority meets its hacker.

Aquarius.title: Signal Generator
Aquarius.text: You embody the blueprint for the future. Detachment keeps your perspective uncorrupted. Revolution arrives as a push notification.

Pisces.title: Dream Hacker
Pisces.text: You dissolve reality’s code and rewrite it with empathy. Boundaries glitch around your presence. Inspiration behaves like a virus you engineered.

Aries.title: Dream Warrior
Aries.text: You chase visions with a sword in hand. Inspiration strikes like lightning and expects immediate action. Mysticism feels more real once you set it on fire.

Taurus.title: Velvet Oracle
Taurus.text: You manifest dreams through texture, ritual, and slow devotion. Spirituality must be touchable. Fantasy gets upholstered in luxury.

Gemini.title: Mercurial Muse
Gemini.text: You speak in riddles that somehow decode reality. Imagination flickers across every conversation. Truth arrives disguised as gossip.

Cancer.title: Moonlit Medium
Cancer.text: Feelings and visions blend until you can’t tell who cried first. Intuition guides every instinct. Home becomes your chapel of wonder.

Leo.title: Solar Prophet
Leo.text: You dramatize the divine until everyone pays attention. Creativity is your altar. Faith looks like a spotlight you willingly step into.

Virgo.title: Sacred Analyst
Virgo.text: You translate dreams into blueprints. Practical magic is your specialty. Miracles get documented and iterated.

Libra.title: Aesthetic Mystic
Libra.text: Beauty opens your third eye. Harmony is a spiritual practice, not a compromise. Relationships become portals to alternate realities.

Scorpio.title: Shadow Visionary
Scorpio.text: You dive into psychic trenches and bring back alchemical truths. Intensity fuels your intuition. Transformation lives on your tongue.

Sagittarius.title: Nomadic Oracle
Sagittarius.text: You follow vision quests across continents and philosophies. Faith must stay mobile. Synchronicities hitchhike in your wake.

Capricorn.title: Mythic Architect
Capricorn.text: You lay foundations for dreams to survive harsh climates. Discipline makes the impossible practical. Destiny listens when you draft timelines.

Aquarius.title: Signal Dreamer
Aquarius.text: You channel collective futures before they trend. Detachment keeps your downloads clear. Visionary blueprints come with upgrade instructions.

Pisces.title: Oceanic Sage
Pisces.text: You dissolve into universal tides and resurface with compassion. Boundaries blur into love letters. Reality softens under your gaze.

Aries.title: Combustion Forge
Aries.text: You reinvent yourself through scorched-earth beginnings. Power arrives when you dare first and ask later. Conflict is your preferred catalyst.

Taurus.title: Obsidian Root
Taurus.text: You transform through unshakable possession and letting go. Resources become talismans. Control is reclaimed by outlasting everything.

Gemini.title: Cipher Breaker
Gemini.text: You weaponize information to expose what’s rotten. Conversations become interrogations. Curiosity digs graves for old lies.

Cancer.title: Ancestral Phoenix
Cancer.text: You rebuild emotional empires from ashes. Family karma bows to your resilience. Vulnerability becomes a sharpened tool.

Leo.title: Solar Dominion
Leo.text: You transmute ego into sovereignty. Power radiates when you embrace radical authenticity. Attention is your chosen crucible.

Virgo.title: Purification Engine
Virgo.text: You dismantle dysfunction with surgical precision. Transformation happens one system at a time. Control thrives in the details.

Libra.title: Balance Reforged
Libra.text: You expose the shadow contracts behind every partnership. Justice demands intensity. Harmony can’t exist without truth.

Scorpio.title: Underworld Monarch
Scorpio.text: You embody metamorphosis itself. Secrets kneel or combust. Power feels natural because you earned it in the dark.

Sagittarius.title: Dogma Burner
Sagittarius.text: You incinerate outdated beliefs and preach rebirth. Truth is a weapon you wield globally. Expansion requires total surrender.

Capricorn.title: Empire Reclaimer
Capricorn.text: You dismantle corrupt structures and rebuild them with iron ethics. Authority is your surgical field. Legacy is a controlled detonation.

Aquarius.title: Revolt Catalyst
Aquarius.text: You mutate society through radical blueprints. Collective power surges when you flip the grid. Detachment helps you pull big levers.

Pisces.title: Abyss Weaver
Pisces.text: You dissolve power structures in oceans of empathy. Surrender becomes alchemy. Spirituality is your pressure cooker.

Aries.title: The Spark
Aries.text: You enter rooms like a flare gun. People clock your intent before your name. Momentum is your calling card.

Taurus.title: The Pillar
Taurus.text: You move with deliberate gravity. Calm radiates even when you’re plotting. Others instinctively trust your pace.

Gemini.title: The Relay
Gemini.text: You greet the world with quicksilver curiosity. Expressions change faster than people can keep up. Every interaction feels like breaking news.

Cancer.title: The Tide
Cancer.text: You read energies before handshakes finish. Soft edges hide armored instincts. People feel both seen and inspected.

Leo.title: The Beacon
Leo.text: Presence arrives before you speak. Confidence is your default posture. Drama follows because you set the stage.

Virgo.title: The Filter
Virgo.text: You present as composed, efficient, and observant. First impressions come with quiet assessments. Every detail feeds your conclusions.

Libra.title: The Mirror
Libra.text: You reflect others with elegance and subtle judgment. Charm is your shield. Harmony is enforced through poise.

Scorpio.title: The Cipher
Scorpio.text: You radiate intrigue wrapped in control. People sense the x-ray gaze. Power enters with you even when you’re silent.

Sagittarius.title: The Horizon
Sagittarius.text: You step in like an expedition leader. Optimism and blunt truth travel together. People expect stories when you start talking.

Capricorn.title: The Summit
Capricorn.text: Authority clings to you on sight. Seriousness isn’t a mood—it’s your aura. Others assume you’re in charge because you already act like it.

Aquarius.title: The Frequency
Aquarius.text: You carry an offbeat signal that intrigues and unnerves. Detachment keeps you unpredictable. People remember you as the original one.

Pisces.title: The Mirage
Pisces.text: You arrive as a soft focus dream. Boundaries blur on impact. Empathy pours out before you realize you’re giving it.

Aries.title: Trailblaze MC
Aries.text: Your public path demands courage and fresh starts. Careers move when you initiate. Legacy favors your risks.

Taurus.title: Evergreen MC
Taurus.text: You build reputations like vineyards—slow, lush, and profitable. Stability becomes your brand. Others trust your long game.

Gemini.title: Broadcast MC
Gemini.text: Visibility comes through words, media, or relentless networking. Careers change as often as your interests. Greatness thrives on adaptability.

Cancer.title: Sanctuary MC
Cancer.text: You become known for caretaking, protection, or emotional intelligence. Legacy is family-shaped. Leadership feels maternal, not meek.

Leo.title: Spotlight MC
Leo.text: You’re meant to be seen. Career success demands creativity and unapologetic pride. Recognition isn’t vanity—it’s proof of impact.

Virgo.title: Craft MC
Virgo.text: You climb through service, expertise, and consistent refinement. Perfectionism is your signature. People rely on your impeccable standards.

Libra.title: Diplomat MC
Libra.text: Public life revolves around aesthetics, partnerships, or negotiation. Reputation rests on fairness. You shape culture through elegance.

Scorpio.title: Phoenix MC
Scorpio.text: You become known for surviving and transforming. Power roles fit because you already speak fluent intensity. Influence requires secrecy and depth.

Sagittarius.title: Oracle MC
Sagittarius.text: You thrive in roles that spread ideas across borders—teaching, travel, philosophy. Public mission: expand minds. Authenticity is non-negotiable.

Capricorn.title: Legacy MC
Capricorn.text: You’re here to build a monument of achievement. Ambition is the engine, endurance the fuel. Respect arrives because you outwork everyone.

Aquarius.title: Reform MC
Aquarius.text: You lead revolutions, collectives, or tech movements. Society expects innovation from you. Legacy hinges on your ability to stay ahead of time.

Pisces.title: Mystic MC
Pisces.text: You become known for intuition, art, or spiritual service. Careers blur boundaries between reality and dream. Compassion is your public currency.

conjunction.title: Unified Self
conjunction.text: Your head and heart share a single microphone. Confidence feels native because there’s no internal dissent. People feel how certain you are.

opposition.title: Solar Eclipse
opposition.text: You oscillate between spotlight and safe house. Wants and needs pull you like tides. Balance comes from honoring both identities.

square.title: Internal Mutiny
square.text: Your ego argues with your emotions in surround sound. You sabotage comfort just to prove a point. Growth demands choosing collaboration over combat.

trine.title: Grace Flow
trine.text: Authenticity is effortless; reactions sync with intentions. Emotional expression amplifies your charisma. People trust you because you move in one direction.

sextile.title: Aligned Currents
sextile.text: Self-expression and instincts work in tandem. You act quickly when feelings signal yes. Small adjustments create smooth momentum.

conjunction.title: Combust Drive
conjunction.text: Your willpower and action fuse into a single punch. Waiting feels like suffocation. Momentum is your default state.

opposition.title: Voltage Duel
opposition.text: Identity and impulse tug-of-war for control. You flip between bold statements and brutal overreactions. Discipline keeps the fuse intact.

square.title: Friction Forge
square.text: You chase conflict like it’s cardio. Pride triggers aggression the moment you feel blocked. Mastery arrives when you aim the fire.

trine.title: Blaze Route
trine.text: You take action the moment ego calls for evolution. Confidence plus speed equals undeniable magnetism. Wins happen because you refuse hesitation.

sextile.title: Primed Engine
sextile.text: Energy ignites easily when purpose knocks. Initiative feels natural and sustainable. Ambition sparks cooperation.

conjunction.title: Golden Aura
conjunction.text: Optimism and identity merge into a beacon. You attract chances by assuming they’re already yours. Generosity amplifies your influence.

opposition.title: Overreach Axis
opposition.text: Confidence bloats into gamble-mode. You toggle between righteous certainty and reckless faith. Humility keeps the expansion real.

square.title: Excess Engine
square.text: You treat limits like rumors. Growth for its own sake drains your focus. Discipline turns your big vision into a blueprint.

trine.title: Fortune Flow
trine.text: Charisma plus purpose equals effortless doors opening. Teaching and leading feel natural. Luck arrives because you act bold with integrity.

sextile.title: Opportunity Pulse
sextile.text: You spot openings quickly and step into them with grace. Confidence syncs with wisdom. Small risks yield outsized rewards.

conjunction.title: Iron Backbone
conjunction.text: Identity is welded to responsibility. You carry authority even when silent. Ambition matures through relentless self-audit.

opposition.title: Authority Clash
opposition.text: Your ego resists external control, yet craves validation. You oscillate between defiance and duty. Integrating both creates unshakable leadership.

square.title: Pressure Crucible
square.text: Self-doubt rides shotgun with ambition. Every move feels graded. Success arrives when you transmute criticism into calibration.

trine.title: Stoic Mastery
trine.text: Structure supports your shine. Discipline flows without drama. People trust you because you deliver what you promise.

sextile.title: Measured Authority
sextile.text: You mix humility with confidence and get steady growth. Planning stabilizes your identity. Respect accumulates quietly.

conjunction.title: Lightning Core
conjunction.text: You live in perpetual jailbreak mode. Authenticity means shocking the system. Freedom isn’t optional; it’s your oxygen.

opposition.title: Voltage Tug
opposition.text: You oscillate between craving stability and detonating it. Identity rebels against expectation at inconvenient times. Integration means owning both needs.

square.title: Disruption Reflex
square.text: You burn bridges just to see what new skyline appears. Authority nerves you, conformity enrages you. Channel rebellion into invention, not implosion.

trine.title: Futurist Flow
trine.text: You innovate simply by breathing. Originality feels effortless. The world adjusts to your frequency, not the reverse.

sextile.title: Pulse Shift
sextile.text: You toggle change on with precision. Personal freedom expands through collaboration. Upgrades arrive the moment complacency whispers.

conjunction.title: Mythic Self
conjunction.text: You project yourself like a living legend. Boundaries blur; inspiration floods. Clarity requires grounding, not surrender.

opposition.title: Mirage Axis
opposition.text: You toggle between raw ego and total dissolution. Disillusion wakes you up. Keep vision tethered to proof.

square.title: Fog Forge
square.text: You chase ideals even when the map is blank. Confusion breeds escapism. Anchor the dream before you launch it.

trine.title: Enchanted Current
trine.text: Creativity flows straight from source. Compassion radiates through your presence. Intent and intuition harmonize.

sextile.title: Inspired Pulse
sextile.text: You sense opportunities to blend imagination with identity. Soft power opens doors. Spiritual nudges guide bold moves.

conjunction.title: Power Core
conjunction.text: You broadcast intensity that can’t be ignored. Transformation starts wherever you stand. People feel both intrigued and unsettled.

opposition.title: Dominion Clash
opposition.text: You attract power struggles that mirror your own force. Control issues surface fast. Mastery means owning your shadow before it owns you.

square.title: Inferno Forge
square.text: Your evolution arrives via pressure and confrontation. Ego deaths are regular programming. Rebirth becomes your signature move.

trine.title: Magnetic Sovereign
trine.text: Authority and depth align. You regenerate with ease and lead through raw authenticity. Influence follows naturally.

sextile.title: Catalyst Current
sextile.text: You sense when to pivot and rebirth. Personal power grows quietly but unmistakably. Transformation partners with purpose.

conjunction.title: Living Spotlight

opposition.text: Public composure versus private tides. Relationships trigger emotional recalibration. Balance means letting trusted people backstage.

square.title: Reactive Aura
square.text: You broadcast what you haven’t processed. External feedback rattles your security. Ground yourself before engagement.

trine.title: Lunar Poise
trine.text: Instinct and presentation harmonize. You nurture spaces simply by entering. Emotional intelligence colors your style.

sextile.title: Gentle Signal
sextile.text: You share just enough softness to invite trust. Allies feel safe leaning in. Public grace stays honest.

conjunction.title: Spoken Face
conjunction.text: Your words define your presence. Quick wit anchors first impressions. You narrate yourself in real time.

opposition.title: Signal Split
opposition.text: Mind and appearance debate the message. You analyze while others expect action. Spell out your perspective to bridge the gap.

square.title: Static Persona
square.text: Nerves scramble delivery. You overthink every gesture. Clarity returns when you trust your script.

trine.title: Fluent Persona
trine.text: Charm and intellect sync. Conversations open doors on contact. You’re remembered for your agile mind.

sextile.title: Quick Calibration
sextile.text: You adjust tone instantly. Networking feels natural because curiosity leads. Rapport happens on cue.

conjunction.title: Magnetic Shell
conjunction.text: Beauty and presence fuse. You draw admiration effortlessly. Style is your calling card.

opposition.title: Charm Axis
opposition.text: People project desires onto you, while you seek genuine connection. Balance requires selective vulnerability.

square.title: Polished Tension
square.text: You look composed while wrestling with approval cravings. Self-worth needs to outrank applause.

trine.title: Velvet Aura
trine.text: Grace pours off you. Relationships start smoothly because kindness is visible. Harmony is your baseline aesthetic.

sextile.title: Curated Glow
sextile.text: You know how to present the most appealing version of yourself without faking it. Collaboration boosts your shine.

conjunction.title: Battle Front
conjunction.text: You enter like a mission in boots. Vitality is obvious. People know you mean business.

opposition.title: Action Mirror
opposition.text: Partners trigger your fight-or-flight reflex. You stride between confrontation and cooperation. Negotiation becomes a survival skill.

square.title: Friction Field
square.text: You look intense even when calm. Others test you just to see your response. Strategic restraint protects your energy.

trine.title: Warrior Poise
trine.text: Confidence reads clean. Initiative and impression sync. You handle challenges the moment they appear.

sextile.title: Primed Presence
sextile.text: You pivot quickly without losing composure. Leadership opportunities find you. Action feels stylish.

conjunction.title: Open Horizon
conjunction.text: Optimism beams through your posture. People assume you have answers. Luck trails your introduction.

opposition.title: Preach Mirror
opposition.text: Public persona, private beliefs—sometimes mismatched. Feedback teaches humility. Share the philosophy, not just the performance.

square.title: Grand Facade
square.text: You promise more than you can show. Image inflation breeds skepticism. Ground the hype with receipts.

trine.title: Blessed Presence
trine.text: Opportunities blossom when you walk in. Enthusiasm reads as sincerity. People feel expanded around you.

sextile.title: Bright Contact
sextile.text: Networking sparks growth quickly. You meet mentors at every crossroads. Generosity keeps the flow going.

conjunction.title: Stone Face
conjunction.text: You look serious because you are. Authority clings to your entrance. Expectations rise instantly.

opposition.title: Duty Axis
opposition.text: Personal freedom wrestles with public obligation. Partnerships challenge your stoicism. Vulnerability becomes the real discipline.

square.title: Rigid Shell
square.text: You guard first impressions like classified intel. Pressure builds behind the mask. Softening doesn’t erase respect.

trine.title: Fortified Presence
trine.text: Responsibility looks elegant on you. People trust your steadiness. Legacy work starts with your introduction.

sextile.title: Measured Mask
sextile.text: You modulate seriousness to fit the moment. Reliability becomes attractive. Allies appreciate your composure.

conjunction.title: Live Wire
conjunction.text: You radiate unpredictability. First impressions feel like plot twists. Authentic weirdness equals magnetism.

opposition.title: Shock Mirror
opposition.text: Relationships challenge your need for freedom. You toggle between lightning bolt and ghost. Boundaries make rebellion sustainable.

square.title: Electric Static
square.text: You rebrand yourself mid-conversation. People struggle to catch up. Focus the flair to keep traction.

trine.title: Future Aura
trine.text: You look like tomorrow and mean it. Insights drop casually. Communities adore your originality.

sextile.title: Pivot Charm
sextile.text: You adapt instantly and inspire others to do the same. Invitations arrive from eclectic circles.

conjunction.title: Mirage Mask
conjunction.text: You appear ethereal, unreadable, and strangely familiar. People project dreams onto you. Grounding keeps you from dissolving.

opposition.title: Fog Mirror
opposition.text: Others see what they want while you crave clarity. Boundaries flicker. Speak your reality before it gets rewritten.

square.title: Blurred Front
square.text: You shapeshift involuntarily. Confusion trails your introductions. Anchor your image in truth.

trine.title: Dream Sheen
trine.text: You glide in with subtle magic. Kindness and intuition show on your face. People exhale around you.

sextile.title: Soft Focus
sextile.text: Empathy colors your aura. You attract collaborators through compassion. Mystique is your quiet brand.

conjunction.title: Obsidian Gaze
conjunction.text: Your stare alone feels like an x-ray. Presence radiates intensity. Power introduces you before you speak.

opposition.title: Shadow Axis
opposition.text: You draw catalytic partnerships. Others reflect buried fears and hunger. Integration requires radical honesty.

square.title: Magnet Tension
square.text: People sense your force and react defensively. You either intimidate or entrance. Own the gravity to soften the edges.

trine.title: Underworld Poise
trine.text: You exude depth and command. Transformation follows wherever you show up. Influence feels inevitable.

sextile.title: Quiet Power
sextile.text: You wield subtle control. Allies respect your unwavering focus. Presence alone shifts dynamics.

conjunction.title: Crown Trajectory
conjunction.text: Career and identity align. You’re known for being undeniably you. Visibility is part of the job description.

opposition.title: Zenith Balance
opposition.text: Home base pulls against public ambition. Relatives keep you grounded while the world watches. Integrate both or burn out.

square.title: Brand Strain
square.text: Self-definition and reputation clash. Reinvention happens in public. Own the narrative before it owns you.

trine.title: Solar Path
trine.text: Recognition follows authenticity. Your name becomes synonymous with your craft. Confidence scales your success.

sextile.title: Trajectory Sync
sextile.text: Personal goals dovetail with career moves. Collaboration resizes your spotlight. Progress feels natural.

conjunction.title: Caretaker Status
conjunction.text: Public persona and emotional life intertwine. You’re known for empathy and protection. Success feels hollow without feeling.

opposition.title: Axis of Comfort
opposition.text: Private needs battle public duty. Family tethers you when ambition roars. Emotional honesty sustains your reputation.

square.title: Mood Stage
square.text: Reputation fluctuates with your tides. Oversharing or secrecy complicates leadership. Emotional hygiene is career maintenance.

trine.title: Lunar Career
trine.text: You nurture on a grand scale. People trust your instincts. Soft power opens elite doors.

sextile.title: Gentle Ascent
sextile.text: You read rooms and respond with tact. Support roles lead to authority. Compassion brands your legacy.

conjunction.title: Broadcast Peak
conjunction.text: Your career rides on intellect and communication. Headlines follow your commentary. Words are your ladder.

opposition.title: Signal Axis
opposition.text: Private analysis competes with public messaging. You need quiet think time to stay sharp on stage.

square.title: Noise Strain
square.text: Overthinking muddles your brand. Mixed messages stall momentum. Simplify the narrative.

trine.title: Clarity Crest
trine.text: You explain complex ideas effortlessly. Authority grows through consistent messaging. Public trust follows your logic.

sextile.title: Network Lift
sextile.text: Contacts boost your path upward. You adapt quickly to new platforms. Curiosity keeps you relevant.

conjunction.title: Aesthetic Zenith
conjunction.text: Charm and artistry headline your career. You’re remembered for elegance and diplomacy. Success must feel beautiful.

opposition.title: Polish Balance
opposition.text: Public poise versus private authenticity. Relationships influence your reputation. Boundaries keep the two aligned.

square.title: Gloss Tension
square.text: You juggle being likable with being real. Favor isn’t the same as respect. Let values steer the brand.

trine.title: Velvet Legacy
trine.text: Partnerships and aesthetics elevate your status. You excel in art, diplomacy, or hospitality. Grace equals currency.

sextile.title: Charm Ladder
sextile.text: Opportunities arrive through social finesse. Collaboration polishes your image. You sell visions effortlessly.

conjunction.title: Command Peak
conjunction.text: Ambition thrusts you into leadership. You’re known for decisive moves. Competition recognizes you as the bar.

opposition.title: Drive Axis
opposition.text: Domestic demands tug against career crusades. You fight to balance both. Delegation equals survival.

square.title: Pressure Launch
square.text: You go hard and hit resistance. Public conflicts raise your profile. Channel aggression into strategy, not spectacle.

trine.title: Action Summit
trine.text: Initiative and reputation reinforce each other. You conquer goals visibly. People expect you to deliver under fire.

sextile.title: Momentum Edge
sextile.text: You seize chances in real time. Projects accelerate because of your presence. Allies value your stamina.

conjunction.title: Mission Crest
conjunction.text: You’re known for big vision and bigger generosity. Careers bloom through teaching, travel, or philosophy. Success must inspire.

opposition.title: Scope Axis
opposition.text: Ambition stretches your roots thin. Home life checks your ego. Integrate meaning before expansion.

square.title: Hype Plateau
square.text: You overextend professionally. Public promises demand proof. Temper enthusiasm with logistics.

trine.title: Fortune Crest
trine.text: You attract luck by living your beliefs publicly. Recognition multiplies when you lead ethically.

sextile.title: Opportunity Rise
sextile.text: Mentors appear often; doors open easily. Gratitude keeps you elevated.

conjunction.title: Authority Apex
conjunction.text: Responsibility defines your reputation. You’re the anchor others depend on. Legacy is built brick by disciplined brick.

opposition.title: Duty Axis
opposition.text: Career gravity competes with private rest. You shoulder expectations even when you’re exhausted. Make room for softness.

square.title: Load Bearing
square.text: Obligations stack high. Failure isn’t an option, so stress spikes. Structure your rest like your work.

trine.title: Legacy Flow
trine.text: Mastery looks effortless because you earned it. Promotions stick. Respect is non-negotiable.

sextile.title: Steady Rise
sextile.text: You climb through persistence and integrity. Allies trust your timelines. Small wins compound.

conjunction.title: Revolt Peak
conjunction.text: You become known for shaking industries. Careers zig where others zag. Freedom is your career plan.

opposition.title: Shock Axis
opposition.text: Public unpredictability disrupts private stability. You chase breakthroughs and forget rest. Set ground rules for your genius.

square.title: Voltage Strain
square.text: Sudden career pivots jar your audience. Expect the unexpected becomes your tagline. Embrace reinvention intentionally.

trine.title: Future Crest
trine.text: Innovation flows naturally into status. You lead cutting-edge movements. Authentic rebellion wins accolades.

sextile.title: Pivot Boost
sextile.text: You catch trend waves early. Collaborations keep your brand fresh. Flexibility equals fame.

conjunction.title: Mythic Peak
conjunction.text: You’re revered for vision, art, or compassion. Public image feels otherworldly. Clarity keeps admirers from projecting fantasies.

opposition.title: Dream Axis
opposition.text: Private intuition clashes with public expectations. Rumors swirl unless you speak plainly. Guard your energy.

square.title: Fog Reputation
square.text: Misunderstandings cloud your career path. You’re idolized or doubted without reason. Transparency is your shield.

trine.title: Halo Path
trine.text: Inspiration fuels your achievements. You make careers feel enchanted. Spiritual purpose aligns with legacy.

sextile.title: Vision Lift
sextile.text: Opportunities appear when you follow intuition. Compassion brands your leadership.

conjunction.title: Power Zenith
conjunction.text: You wield influence that reshapes institutions. Reputation equals transformation. Authority is inevitable.

opposition.title: Dominion Axis
opposition.text: Public power clashes with personal vulnerability. Family or roots challenge your intensity. Humility keeps the crown.

square.title: Pressure Crest
square.text: You face public tests of will. Scandals or crises force reinvention. Survival becomes part of your brand.

trine.title: Sovereign Rise
trine.text: You command respect through controlled intensity. Reforms succeed because you own them. Legacy feels unstoppable.

sextile.title: Catalyst Peak
sextile.text: You sense when to pull strings. Impact grows quietly, then all at once. Influence is a strategic tool.
